paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted pathogenic germline variants in the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A second hit in BRCA2 was also observed in a patient with ovarian cancer.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with loss of function leading to increased cancer risk.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was noted to have a second hit in the tumor sample.
key_quotes: A second hit in BRCA2 was also observed in a patient with ovarian cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was extracted successfully.
